creator: nivini
title: SCRUM monkey
description: This project turns a monkey toy that makes noises and blinks into an alarm controlled by a Raspberry Pi. The alarm is activated at a specific time using a Python script and Linux crontab.
steps: Connect the monkey toy to the Raspberry Pi using a Darlington transistor (TIP120/121/122 family) for switching, considering the monkey's power supply is 3.3V.
Write a Python script to activate the alarm at the desired time (13:40 in the example).
Use the Linux crontab program to schedule the Python script to run at the specified time. Open the crontab editor by typing 'crontab -e' in the Linux shell.
In the crontab editor, add a line specifying the schedule and the command to execute the Python script, for example: '40 13 * * * /usr/bin/python /home/scrum_monkey.py'
